title: Exercise 4.4: Improve a program (densities)
description: Implement read_densities_join(filename) and read_densities_substrings(filename) to parse data/densities.dat into dict with underscores in multiword names.
hints: In join version, join all tokens except the last as the name.
In substrings version, split using fixed-width columns and strip spaces.
Replace internal spaces with underscores (e.g., Earth_core).
